description:
Named after the tallest mountain in the Western Hemisphere, the Aconcagua 3 Vest packs warmth and wind-resistance worthy of cold environments. Warm-when-wet synthetic insulation and high-loft down seals in body heat. The highly wind-resistant fabric prevents your well-earned warmth from blowing away on gusty days.

  • Wind-resistant 50-denier recycled polyester shell with a PFC-free DWR finish to shed light moisture
  • 600-fill-power down insulation meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Blend of 600-fill down and synthetic insulation provides core warmth while keeping you dry
  • Standard fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: The North Face Aconcagua 3 Vest - Men's
